unnormalised: Arre yaar, pesticide usage is tricky! My kaka in Punjab had a bad experience back in '98. Too much spraying, unhealthy crops. Heard ICAR is researching better options. Maybe try neem oil like Dadi used to, back in the day? Saw some stuff on it at 14:00 hrs on Krishi Darshan, DD Kisan on 26/01/2024. Rs. 500 for 5 litres seems good. 10 km from my village they sell. Happened again 03/03/2024, with my neighbour.
normalised: Arre yaar, pesticide usage is tricky! My kaka in Punjab had a bad experience back in ninety eight. Too much spraying, unhealthy crops. Heard I C A R is researching better options. Maybe try neem oil like Dadi used to, back in the day? Saw some stuff on it at two post meridiem on Krishi Darshan, D D Kisan on twenty sixth January two thousand and twenty four. Rupee five hundred for five liter seems good. Ten kilometer from my village they sell. Happened again third March two thousand and twenty four, with my neighbor.
